special_abilities.name: Low Cunning.
descriptions: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Overbearing Pack.
descriptions: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Raxivort's Tongue.
descriptions: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.
